name: FLEX Disc Golf
description:
WHAT'S THE GAME?

It's a third person disc golf simulator designed to give an authentic playing experience similar to being on the course with physics of actual disc golf - giving both challenge and reward!

WHAT'S DISC GOLF?

Disc golf plays very similar to golf but uses concaved discs that are thrown into baskets rather than golf balls that are hit by clubs into holes. If you've never played golf of any sort this is your gateway!

WHAT CAN YOU DO?

Play on courses throughout the world, find lost discs or buy new ones, and learn new throws and styles! Experience realistic gameplay while being surrounded by highly detailed nature.

WHERE'S DEVELOPMENT?

The game is rapidly developing and is ready for playing. Currently there are two 18 hole courses with ten more being created for the base game. Animations, physics, and disc models are being developed and implemented. The in-game store is built and being finalized while multiplayer capabilities are being added gradually.

WHAT UPDATES TO EXPECT?

FLEX Disc Golf will be continuously expanding, with new courses, tournaments, discs, and multiplayer features added regularly.


  • Improved Disc & Chain Physics
  • Additional Throw Animations
  • Gamepad/Controller Support
  • In-game Disc Store
  • Online Leaderboards
  • 6/12 Vanilla Courses
  • 12/12 Vanilla Courses
  • 4 Player Online Coop
  • Online Tournaments
